item.title: Coachella Valley USD Job Updates January 24, 2019
item.description: Coachella Valley Unified School District removed four positions open to district employees only. Removed: District Employees ONLY Campus Security Assistant District Employees ONLY Paraeducator Moderate/Severe Disabilities (Cesar Chavez Elementary) District Employees ONLY Parent/Community Liaison (Mountain Vista Elementary) District Employees Only Safety Supervisor (Children & Family Services)

item.title: Now Tracking: Coachella Valley Unified School District
